org.sindice.siren.qparser.keyword.builders

Interface KeywordQueryBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.core.builders.QueryBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnyQueryNodeBuilder, BoostQueryNodeBuilder, DatatypeQueryNodeBuilder, FieldQueryNodeBuilder, GroupQueryNodeBuilder, KeywordQueryTreeBuilder, MatchAllDocsQueryNodeBuilder, MatchNoDocsQueryNodeBuilder, ModifierQueryNodeBuilder, MultiPhraseQueryNodeBuilder, NodeBooleanQueryNodeBuilder, NodeFuzzyQueryNodeBuilder, NodeNumericRangeQueryNodeBuilder, NodePhraseQueryNodeBuilder, NodePrefixWildcardQueryNodeBuilder, NodeTermRangeQueryNodeBuilder, NodeWildcardQueryNodeBuilder, SlopQueryNodeBuilder, TopLevelQueryNodeBuilder

    public interface KeywordQueryBuilder
extends org.apache.lucene.queryparser.flexible.core.builders.QueryBuilder
    This interface should be implemented by every class that wants to build Query objects from QueryNode objects.
    See Also:
    QueryBuilder, QueryTreeBuilder
